Class JarModuleFinder

  • java.lang.Object

    ModuleFinder

    public final class JarModuleFinder
extends Object
implements ModuleFinder
    A module finder which uses a JAR file as a module repository.

    David M. Lloyd

      • findModule

        public ModuleSpec findModule(ModuleIdentifier identifier,
                    ModuleLoader delegateLoader)
                      throws ModuleLoadException
        Description copied from interface: ModuleFinder
        Find a module specification for the given identifier.
        Specified by:
        findModule in interface ModuleFinder
        Parameters:
        identifier - the module identifier
        delegateLoader - the module loader from which dependencies should be resolved
        Returns:
        the module specification, or null if no specification is found for this identifier
        Throws:
        ModuleLoadException
